data.name: The World Of Others
data.detailed_description:
Update Notes

The World Of Others UPDATE #1 20-02-23 - added english subtitles - fixed some collision and physics bugs - added more items


About the Game

Humanity is experiencing its darkest hour. Strangers from a distant planet land on earth and want to wipe out the humans. Your wife Laura is being taken by the aliens. Find B1-12 and face the challenge of finding Laura. -Fight your enemies with up to 5 different weapons. -Collect ammunition for the weapons to be ready to fight. -Care for your injuries with medipacks to hold out. -Use your torch to keep an overview in the dark. -But make sure you always carry enough batteries. Good luck...
data.about_the_game:
Humanity is experiencing its darkest hour.

Strangers from a distant planet land on earth and want to
wipe out the humans. Your wife Laura is being taken by the aliens.
Find B1-12 and face the challenge of finding Laura.

-Fight your enemies with up to 5 different weapons.
-Collect ammunition for the weapons to be ready to fight.
-Care for your injuries with medipacks to hold out.
-Use your torch to keep an overview in the dark.
-But make sure you always carry enough batteries.

Good luck...
data.short_description: The World Of Others is a Singleplayer First-Person-Shooter with a unique Story. Fight your enemies with up to 5 different weapons. Collect ammunition for the weapons to be ready to fight. Care for your injuries with medipacks to hold out.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7~64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX 8350, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 - 1300, Intel Core i5-4460, i5-4690 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon RX 560, X 570 (2GB or higher)
  • Storage: 27 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10~64Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1400 - 1600, Intel Core i7 4770 - 4790 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780, GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 (3GB or higher)
  • Storage: 27 GB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:
